original_title: Vistara to resume flights between Colombo and Mumbai
original_body_lines: Gurugam- based Indian full-service airline  Vistara is scheduled to resume operations to Sri Lanka today (01 March).
Accordingly, direct flights plying from Colombo to Mumbai will resume today, and will operate four days a week.
Tata SIA Airlines Limited,  operating as Vistara, is a joint venture between Tata Sons and Singapore Airlines.
